cards

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • cards.BaseCards
      • cards.Cards
        • cards.OrderedCards

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Card>, StreamAble<Card>

    public final class Deck
extends OrderedCards
    When you construct a deck, a set of cards are set automatically. These cards' owner is deck instance.
